name: dotbox-checkbox
description: The checkbox component provides customizable checkboxes, radio buttons, and toggle switches with various styling options.

properties.name: variant
properties.description: Visual variant (primary, success, danger, info, default)

properties.name: size
properties.description: Size of the input (small, default, large)

cssParts.name: toggle
cssParts.description: The toggle switch element (only for toggle type)

cssParts.name: slider
cssParts.description: The slider element (only for toggle type)

events.name: change
events.description: Dispatched when the input value changes

events.name: input
events.description: Dispatched when the input value is being changed

examples.title: Checkboxes
examples.code:
<dotbox-checkbox label="Default Checkbox"></dotbox-checkbox>
<dotbox-checkbox variant="success" label="Success Checkbox" checked></dotbox-checkbox>
<dotbox-checkbox variant="danger" label="Danger Checkbox" disabled></dotbox-checkbox>

examples.title: Radio Buttons
examples.code:
<dotbox-checkbox type="radio" name="radio-group" variant="primary" label="Option 1" checked></dotbox-checkbox>
<dotbox-checkbox type="radio" name="radio-group" variant="primary" label="Option 2"></dotbox-checkbox>
<dotbox-checkbox type="radio" name="radio-group" variant="primary" label="Option 3"></dotbox-checkbox>

examples.title: Toggle Switches
examples.code:
<dotbox-checkbox type="toggle" label="Default Toggle"></dotbox-checkbox>
<dotbox-checkbox type="toggle" variant="success" label="Success Toggle" checked></dotbox-checkbox>
<dotbox-checkbox type="toggle" variant="danger" label="Danger Toggle" disabled></dotbox-checkbox>

examples.title: Size Variations
examples.code:
<dotbox-checkbox size="small" label="Small Checkbox"></dotbox-checkbox>
<dotbox-checkbox label="Default Checkbox"></dotbox-checkbox>
<dotbox-checkbox size="large" label="Large Checkbox"></dotbox-checkbox>

examples.title: Label Positioning
examples.code:
<dotbox-checkbox label="Right Label (Default)" labelPosition="right"></dotbox-checkbox>
<dotbox-checkbox label="Left Label" labelPosition="left"></dotbox-checkbox>

examples.title: Required Inputs
examples.code:
<dotbox-checkbox label="Required Checkbox" required></dotbox-checkbox>
<dotbox-checkbox type="radio" name="required-radio" label="Required Radio" required></dotbox-checkbox>
<dotbox-checkbox type="toggle" label="Required Toggle" required></dotbox-checkbox>
